statements: UPDATE order_routing_rules SET order_type='Limit' WHERE rule_id=1
UPDATE order_routing_rules SET execution_strategy='Best Price' WHERE symbol='AAPL'
UPDATE order_routing_rules SET order_type='Limit', execution_strategy='Immediate' WHERE rule_id=101
UPDATE order_routing_rules SET symbol='AAPL', execution_strategy='HighFrequency' WHERE rule_id=204
UPDATE order_routing_rules SET rule_name = 'Rule 1', route_priority = 1 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE execution_strategies SET strategy_description = 'This is a new strategy.', parameters = '{"param1": 10, "param2": "value"}' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE order_routing_rules SET route_priority = 5, route_destination = 'Exchange' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE execution_strategies SET parameters = '{"stop_loss": 20, "take_profit": 50}' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE order_routing_rules SET route_priority = 10 WHERE rule_id = 1;
UPDATE algorithmic_strategies SET strategy_description = 'New strategy description' WHERE strategy_id = 3;
UPDATE order_routing_rules SET route_priority = 10, rule_name = 'New Rule Name' WHERE rule_id = 1;
UPDATE routing_instructions SET strategy_id = 2, instruction_details = 'Updated instruction details' WHERE instruction_id = 3;
UPDATE order_routing_rules SET condition = 'new condition' WHERE rule_id = 1;
UPDATE execution_instructions SET instruction_text = 'updated instruction text' WHERE instruction_id = 2;
UPDATE order_routing_rules SET condition = 'IF price > 100' WHERE rule_id = 1;
UPDATE execution_instructions SET instruction_text = 'Execute Order' WHERE strategy_id = 2 AND instruction_id = 1;
UPDATE order_routing_rules SET execution_strategy = 'New Strategy' WHERE rule_id = 1;
UPDATE execution_strategies SET description = 'Updated description', parameters = '{"param1": "value1", "param2": "value2"}' WHERE strategy_id = 2;
UPDATE order_routing_rules SET execution_strategy = 'Manual Trading' WHERE rule_id = 1;
UPDATE execution_strategies SET parameters = '{"stop_loss": true, "take_profit": true}' WHERE strategy_id = 3;
